name: goride-monorepo
description: GoRide - Monorepo với Microservices, Gateway, và Frontend

scripts.start:dev: npm run build:shared && concurrently -n "GATEWAY,AUTH-SVC,WEB-USER,WEB-MGR" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start:gateway:dev" "npm run start:auth-service:dev" "npm run start:web-user:dev" "npm run start:web-manager:dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:web-user && npm run build:web-manager
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules web-user/node_modules web-manager/node_modules shared/node_modules
